p.k: This episode focuses on the king of fruit, MANGO. Though widely known as a tropical fruit, Japan produces high-end MANGOS often given as gifts. Find out more about Japan's special fruit.
p.d: Today, we focus on the king of fruit, mango. Though often thought of as a tropical fruit, they are also grown in Japan. Large, delicious, gorgeous Japanese mangos are traded at incredibly high prices, and are often given as gifts. Our reporter visits a mango grower in Kyushu to learn more about the secrets behind the production of this high-end fruit. Also enjoy unique seasonings made from mango.
